pr_title: Fix for cards not showing up inside card browser if deck contains wildcard characters in its name.

timeline.message: added logic to return exact match for a deck if it exists before a wildcard leads to a regex search in Finder.java
fixed some automatic changes made  by android studio

timeline.body:
This was changed, but I don't think there was a reason for it

```suggestion
                for (Deck d : mCol.getDecks().all()) {
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
This was changed, but I don't think there was a reason for it

Suggested change
for (JSONObject d : mCol.getDecks().all()) {
for (Deck d : mCol.getDecks().all()) {
timeline.author: david-allison-1
